DOC.brief_summary: This is a comparison of clinical outcomes between a pre-hospital and an in-hospital thrombolysis patient registry.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Pre-hospital and In-hospital Iv-tPA Stroke Treatment
DOC.criteria: Acute ischemic stroke diagnosis with thrombolytic treatment Admission via EMS Known premorbid status of need of assistance NIHSS before treatment available Time of onset (or last well seen) between 4:00am and 10:30pm Unknown time of onset Inhospital thrombolysis despite decision against treatment because of contraindications in STEMO
